title: PENTAX Medical Announces the Release of Endoscopy Image and Document Management Software, endoPRO iQ(R), 7.7
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/16/2015 @ 10:45 AM   PENTAX Medical 
MONTVALE, NJ--(Marketwired - September 16, 2015) - PENTAX Medical Company, a healthcare industry leader in endoscopic imaging, announced today the release of the latest update of endoPRO iQ ® , version 7.7, a DIACAP certified information technology and image management software for endoscopy units. endoPRO iQ 7.7 unveils the latest advancements in software engineering with efficiency-focused workflow capabilities, new modules that support ICD-10 coding, and precision reporting for quality measurements. 
As healthcare reporting requirements shift from being fee-for-service to value based, it has become imperative for facilities and physicians to capture and report appropriate quality indicators to increase operational efficiency and facilitate clinical improvement. endoPRO iQ 7.7 is designed to streamline physician documentation by offering a user-friendly interface with new features like Template Favorites and Menu Favorites within Doc-U-Scribe™. The software's sleek design and image review enhancements also provide users with a new drag-and-drop image annotation feature. Images can now be placed onto an anatomical model, annotating the image with the location of where in the body the image was taken during a procedure. 
endoPRO iQ 7.7 provides a rich new series of modules, including the new pathology results feature. This module enables users to easily report adenoma detection rates, track procedures that are pending pathology results, and assign histological results. In addition, the software shows side-by-side image comparisons of obtained tissue and pathology results within the procedure report. 
With version 7.7, physicians can use time stamps associated with Cecum image documentation to report withdrawal averages and withdrawal time, and determine the rate of complete intubations. Physicians now have up-to-date compliance for both GIQIQuIC and PQRS reporting, which will support the advancement of physician and overall facility performance. 
endoPRO iQ 7.7 has cross-platform compatibility, interfacing with all brands of endoscopic equipment, and integrating seamlessly with healthcare information systems and other medical devices crucial to quality patient care. The endoPRO iQ service and support team has years of experience converting EndoWorks and ProVation MD databases, providing access to all previously stored information from other platforms in endoPRO iQ. 
"Only PENTAX Medical can combine the best in endoscopic equipment, software solutions, and services, all in a single turn-key operation. Our team holistically focuses on helping our customers increase efficiency, decrease healthcare costs, and most importantly, advance patient care. We think our customers value our commitment to the informatics space and will be very pleased with the new functionality offered by endoPRO iQ 7.7." 
-- Chris Burton, President, PENTAX Medical Americas 
"With diminishing reimbursement and growing pressure on physicians to increase volume, we strive to provide our customers with the most efficient and effective technology for streamlining procedure workflow. There is no doubt that the new and improved features of endoPRO iQ 7.7 will have a positive impact on the daily lives of gastroenterologists and their patients." 
-- Dr. Mark Koppel, Chief Medical Officer, PENTAX Medical Americas 
Technology advancements are rapidly creating opportunity for improvement in endoscopy treatment. Standardized treatment protocols and software application interfacing are changing the way we provide care today. PENTAX Medical and the endoPRO iQ solution are paving the way for hospital performance in endoscopy. 
For more information about endoPRO iQ 7.7, please visit www.ConverttoiQ.com
